short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Pomodoro Timer to boost productivity with event management.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing NYANYA Pomodoro Timer â€“ Boost Productivity and Manage Your Time Effectively!

NYANYA is a powerful Chrome extension that combines the popular Pomodoro Technique with seamless integration to Google Calendar. Take control of your time, stay focused, and accomplish more with this productivity tool designed to optimize your work sessions and effortlessly manage your events.

Key Features:
1. Pomodoro Timer: Utilize the Pomodoro Technique, a time management method, to work in focused bursts and increase productivity. Set your preferred work and break durations, and NYANYA will guide you through timed sessions with visual cues and notifications.

2. Seamless Google Calendar Integration: NYANYA allows you to effortlessly manage your schedule by directly adding events to your Google Calendar. With a single click, open a new tab to Google Calendar and create events for important tasks, appointments, or deadlines.

3. Customizable Timer Settings: Tailor the Pomodoro Timer to suit your needs. Adjust the work and break durations according to your preference or the nature of your tasks. NYANYA provides flexibility, empowering you to optimize your productivity workflow.

4. Desktop Notifications: Stay informed and in control with desktop notifications. Receive timely alerts when the timer completes a work session or break, ensuring you stay on track with your schedule without having to constantly check the timer.

How to Use NYANYA:
1. Install the NYANYA Pomodoro Timer Chrome extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Set your desired work and break durations using the options provided.
3. Click the "Start" button to begin a Pomodoro work session.
4. Work with full focus until the timer completes the work duration.
5. Take a well-deserved break when prompted, and return refreshed for the next session.
6. To add an event to Google Calendar, click the "Add Event" button and create an event directly from the extension.
7. Customize the timer settings or pause/resume the timer as needed.
8. Stay informed with desktop notifications that keep you updated on the progress of your work sessions.

NYANYA Pomodoro Timer is an indispensable tool for students, professionals, freelancers, and anyone seeking to enhance their time management skills. Whether you're studying, working on projects, or balancing multiple commitments, NYANYA helps you stay organized, focused, and efficient.

Don't let distractions and disorganization hinder your productivity. Install NYANYA Pomodoro Timer now and unlock the power of the Pomodoro Technique while effortlessly managing your schedule with Google Calendar integration!
